creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
description: color photo montage; interior view of a large room with pink and white walls and purple door at right, with yellow refrigerator with open door near center; blue woman at left pulling a green glove with yellow strips on her PL hand; man with pink skin and hair wearing a green sweater at right; woman with frizzy hair wearing a pink shirt, seated at a table at left; black borders
signed: LLC in white: Sandy Skoglund \'86 20/25 Green Glove
title: Green Glove
